member.name: T:MetalWeightCalculator.Density

member.name: T:MetalWeightCalculator.FlatBar
member.summary: Calculating the weight or length of a Flat bar made of different metals (steel pipes, stainless steel, copper, etc.).

member.name: M:MetalWeightCalculator.FlatBar.CalculateWeight(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculating the weight of a Flat bar.
member.param: Density of the metal from which the Flat bar is made in g/cm³.
member.returns: Weight of a Flat bar in kilograms.
member.exception: At least one of the passed arguments does not meet the parameter specification of the called method.

member.name: M:MetalWeightCalculator.FlatBar.CalculateLength(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculating the lenght of a Flat bar.
member.param: Density of the metal from which the Flat bar is made in g/cm³.
member.returns: Lenght of a Flat bar in millimetres.
member.exception: At least one of the passed arguments does not meet the parameter specification of the called method.

member.summary: Argument must be greater than zero.
